articles.author: Arlette Saenz, Betsy Klein
articles.title: Biden fulfilling promise to visit Africa as US looks to counter China’s deepening influence in region - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden will fulfill a two-year promise to visit Africa as he departs Sunday night for Angola, a trip aimed at highlighting US investment in the continent under his watch in the face of China’s deepening inroads in the region.
